mapper.sql: id, parent_id, channel_id, device_id, `name`, manufacture, model, `owner`, civil_code, block, address, parental, safety_way, register_way, cert_num, certifiable, err_code, end_time, secrecy, ip_address, port, `password`, ptz_type, ptz_type_text, `status`, longitude, latitude, longitude_gcj02, latitude_gcj02, longitude_wgs84, latitude_wgs84, sub_count, stream_id, has_audio,has_record, channel_type, business_group_id, gps_time, create_user_id, create_time, update_user_id, update_time
mapper.select: select vdc.*, vdc.longitude_wgs84 as longitude, vdc.latitude_wgs84 as latitude, vdc.parental as parental, '0' as channelType, vpc.id as parentId from video_device_channel vdc left join video_platform_gb_channel vpgc on vdc.channel_id = vpgc.device_channel_id left join video_platform_catalog vpc on vpc.id = vpgc.catalog_id and vpc.platform_id = vpgc.platform_id where vpgc.platform_id = #{serverGbId}

select vgs.gb_id as channelId, 'springbootcloud' as manufacture, '1' as channelType, vgs.name as name, vst.status as status, vgs.longitude as longitude, vgs.latitude as latitude, vpcg.id as parentId, '1' as registerWay, vpcg.civil_code as civilCode, 'live' as model, 'springbootcloud' as owner, '0' as parental, '0' as secrecy from video_gb_stream vgs left join ( select if(${usPushingAsStatus},vsp.push_ing,vsp.status) as status, vsp.app as app, vsp.stream as stream from video_stream_push vsp union all select spxy.status as status, spxy.app as app, spxy.stream as stream from video_stream_proxy spxy ) vst on vst.app = vgs.app and vst.stream = vgs.stream left join video_platform_gb_stream vpgs on vgs.gb_id = vpgs.gb_stream_id left join video_platform_catalog vpcg on vpgs.platform_id = vpcg.platform_id and vpgs.catalog_id = vpcg.id where vpgs.platform_id = #{serverGbId}
and vgs.gb_id = #{gbId}

select null as parentId, vd.device_id as id,vd.device_id as name ,vd.device_id as deviceId,1 as type, vd.online as status from video_device vd union all select vdc.device_id as parentId ,vdc.channel_id as id ,vdc.channel_id as name,vdc.device_id as deviceId,2 as type, vdc.status as status from video_device_channel vdc
